website_summaries.verdict: A good, standard lifting bar with more drastic angles in the handle for better grip and ergonomics.
pros: The bar places the hands and grip in the proper position to work a variety of muscles in the arms
The angled grips are beginner-friendly for users who cannot handle the strain of a straight lift bar
cons: Bar may not feel right in the hands of users more experienced with straight lifting bars

customer_reviews.title: Solid product!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product, so glad I didn't buy one of the 2-piece bars you have to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done plus
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what you see. It's ergonomic and the knurling provides good grip without being over aggressive. The plates are far enough apart you can use if for a bench bar if you're on a budget, it's also pretty comfortable on the back for squats. I only wish it came with clamps but those are cheap enough to not be worth removing a star.
customer_reviews.author: ghostkey

customer_reviews.title: wanted something to put quick release clamps on but not olympic
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy a non-threaded version but my quick release spring clamps are more than adequate for the weight I'm using. I like the more severe angled grips vs other models although I wish the knurling went across the middle for close grip stuff but I wear gloves anyways so no big deal as none of the others did that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Althoff

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bar. Note: it has more curve than other similar EZ-curl bars and this makes it more comfortable on your wrists. I wish I had purchased this bar earlier! If you're looking for an EZ-curl bar this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: James Perales

customer_reviews.title: Best EZ curl bar for 1" dia. hole plates
customer_reviews.text: Angle on the bar is at the perfect angle - basically a 45° angle. Knurl is perfect as well. Just a nice solid EZ curl bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Good solid ez curl bar. Not 1"
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice EZ Curl bar but it is 25mm, not 1". I know that isn't much of a difference but the reason it matters is that my spring clamps, that have been used on a true 1" bar for years, wouldn't work on this new bar. (too loose) Easy enough fix, just had to buy new clamps. Wish this bar would ship with clamps but still would recommend this bar to anyone that wants an EZ Curl bar. (Just buy some clamps to go with it)
customer_reviews.author: George Vetter

customer_reviews.title: a helpful tool
customer_reviews.text: I got a used one, but it still works just fine. I got this for doing triceps work, but I also use it for curls because my joints are getting old and can't really handle a straight bar at this point. A good investment.
customer_reviews.author: B. Florence

customer_reviews.title: BEST BAR EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BAR!!! Best EZ bar you can purchase hands down. Extremely well made, durable, top notch knurling, great balance. You can't go wrong with the purchase of the bar. Dr.D.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.D.

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with shipping container torn. Product itself (curl bar) was of very poor quality: bar itself was significantly less than alleged 1" diameter; grip knurling was nothing more than stamped on; "chrome" finish was pitted in several places. I did not keep bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jon P.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid 10 lb. bar
customer_reviews.text: 10 pound bar built very solid. Only gripe I have is one side is knurled too sharply, so my son and I have to use gloves, but that is ok, makes us feel that much tougher, hehe. Other thing is the picture, the bends are not nearly as sharp as it shows and is built pretty much like any other bar, so it won't stress out your wrists or any other muscle that we've noticed, but it's not really a gripe, we like the bar just how it's made except for them pesky sharp knurls on one side.
customer_reviews.author: HostileHST

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I have personally tested it with up to 180lbs and it performed well. I have not had any flaking from this bar yet. I wish the knurling extended down further on the inner bend for close grip curls, but not a huge deal. I chose this bar over others because it doesn't have threaded ends, making it perfect for spring collars.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Grodeon

customer_reviews.title: Standard Curl Bar
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time, package good no damage,. Works great.. no problems with my standard Weider Weight Set
customer_reviews.author: JWM

customer_reviews.title: Not 1"
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, solid bar. The only issue is the bar is not 1", as other reviewers have mentioned. You just need to get different clamps if you already have true 1" clamps like I do. If the bar isn't held level then the weights slip off of it. But otherwise it's a great bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: FYI
customer_reviews.text: The bar I received measures less than 15/16" in diameter. Not 1" as shown in the picture. My locking 1" clamps do not hold tight because the bar is too small. This makes the bar useless unless I buy some other kind of clamp with trial and error. False advertising and misleading. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Vote

customer_reviews.title: Best curl bar around
customer_reviews.text: Best curl bar ever. Look no further. Just about gym quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great curl bar!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bar with good balance and a chrome finish. The bar angle is perfect for bicep curls. The bar ends are about 8 inches long, allowing plenty of room for weights and a clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Viper Bill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curves, bends like Beckham.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it is a solid bar and it is absolutely beautiful. Love the curves on this ol gal.
customer_reviews.author: Angela slaven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gift for my son and he loved it said it was top quality and uses it all the time..
customer_reviews.author: Theresa West

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What is there not to like. Solid bar. Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: MrCantBelieveIt

customer_reviews.title: Body-Solid Standard Curl Bar, 47", Chrome
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Very sturdy, heavy material. Good grips. Only wish it would have come with clamps as I am finding it difficult to pair a pair of inexpensive clamps to hold the weights.
customer_reviews.author: M Masutson

customer_reviews.title: Solid bar works with doing clips
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about the bar is that you can use spring clips with it. The grip is secure, but you may want/need to use gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: solid bar
customer_reviews.text: nicely made, nicely finished, appears will last a long time. Although says built by Body Solid, this wasn't apparent from the packaging. I didn't know whether to order reatiner clips at purchase but decided to go ahead and order the Valeo clips. No retainer clips were included with the bar and the Valeo clips fit it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bar with perfect bends, not to dramatic and not to suttle
customer_reviews.author: Randy0710

customer_reviews.title: Damage!
customer_reviews.text: Box is open you can see the item hanging out the packaging the item is damage as well very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: A.P.P

product_meta.title: Body-Solid RB47 47 in. Olympic Super Curl Barbell for Bicep and Triceps Curls, Chrome
product_meta.description: Made of solid steel with a chromed finish and medium depth diamond knurling for non slip grip, the Body-Solid Olympic super curl barbell can be combined with Olympic plates with a 2 inch center hole for added weight. Target the forearm, biceps, triceps, back and chest muscles with this super curl bar. It can be used for several exercises including; tricep extensions, preacher curls, drop set, reverse grip, upright row and more. The super angled shaft is designed to reduce discomfort when lifting weights. Revolving sleeves also help to reduce pressure on the wrists and forearms and prevent bar from warping. The Olympic curl barbell measures 47 in. length, 32 in. shaft length, and 7-1/2 in. sleeve length. The Olympic super curl bar can be used in any home gym or commercial fitness facility for a variety of workout regiments.
feature_bullets: Weight curling bar isolates and intensifies the development of bicep and forearm muscles
Biomechanically angled dual grips help you avoid injury
Bar weighs 11 pounds and has a 200-pound capacity
7-3/4-inch collar length (collars not included) and 30-inch inside sleeve length
